00020 // This file is designed to encapsulate all time keeping done by Minion.
00021 
00022 #include <sys/time.h>
00023 #include <sys/resource.h>
00024 
00025 #define TIME_STRUCT timeval
00026 
00027 #define CPU_TIME_STRUCT rusage
00028 
00029 inline void get_current_time(TIME_STRUCT& t) { gettimeofday(&t, NULL); }
00030 inline void get_current_cpu_time(CPU_TIME_STRUCT& t) { getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF, &t); }
00031   
00032 inline double diff_cpu_time(const CPU_TIME_STRUCT& end_time, const CPU_TIME_STRUCT& start_time)
00033 {
00034   double time = end_time.ru_utime.tv_sec - start_time.ru_utime.tv_sec;
00035   time += (end_time.ru_utime.tv_usec - start_time.ru_utime.tv_usec) / 1000000.0;
00036   return time;
00037 }
00038 
00039 inline double diff_sys_time(const CPU_TIME_STRUCT& end_time, const CPU_TIME_STRUCT& start_time)
00040 {
00041   double sys_time = end_time.ru_stime.tv_sec - start_time.ru_stime.tv_sec;
00042   sys_time += (end_time.ru_stime.tv_usec - start_time.ru_stime.tv_usec) / 1000000.0;
00043   return sys_time;
00044 }
00045 
00046 inline double diff_time(const TIME_STRUCT& end_wallclock, const TIME_STRUCT& start_wallclock)
00047 {
00048   // Get final wallclock time.
00049   double time_wallclock = end_wallclock.tv_sec - start_wallclock.tv_sec;
00050   time_wallclock += (end_wallclock.tv_usec - start_wallclock.tv_usec) / 1000000.0;
00051   return time_wallclock;
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline double cpu_time_elapsed(CPU_TIME_STRUCT& start_time)
00055 { 
00056   CPU_TIME_STRUCT t;
00057   get_current_cpu_time(t);
00058   return diff_cpu_time(t, start_time);
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 enum Output_Type
00063 
00064 { Output_Always, Output_1, Output_2};
00065   
00066 class TimerClass
00067 {
00068   CPU_TIME_STRUCT _internal_start_time;
00069   CPU_TIME_STRUCT _last_check_time;
00070   TIME_STRUCT start_wallclock;
00071 
00072   Output_Type output;
00073 public:
00074   
00075   void setOutputType(int version)
00076   {
00077     switch(version)
00078     {
00079       case 1 : output = Output_1; return;
00080       case 2 : output = Output_2; return;
00081       default:
00082         cerr << "This copy of Minion doesn't support output format " + to_string(version);
00083         abort();
00084     }
00085   }
00086   
00087   TimerClass() : output(Output_1) 
00088   { 
00089     cout.setf(ios::fixed); 
00090     startClock(); 
00091   }
00092   
00093 void startClock()
00094 {
00095   get_current_cpu_time(_internal_start_time);
00096   _last_check_time = _internal_start_time;
00097   get_current_time(start_wallclock);
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool checkTimeout(unsigned seconds)
00101 { return cpu_time_elapsed(_internal_start_time) >= seconds; }
00102 
00103 void printTimestepWithoutReset(Output_Type t, const char* time_name)
00104 { 
00105   if(t != Output_Always && t != output)
00106     return;
00107   cout << time_name << cpu_time_elapsed(_last_check_time) << endl; 
00108 } 
00109 
00110 void maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_Type t, const char* time_name, const char* store_name, TableOut & tableout, bool toprint)
00111 {
00112   if(t != Output_Always && t != output)
00113     return;
00114     
00115   CPU_TIME_STRUCT temp_time;
00116   get_current_cpu_time(temp_time);
00117   double diff = diff_cpu_time(temp_time, _last_check_time);
00118   if(toprint) cout << time_name << diff << endl;
00119   _last_check_time = temp_time;
00120   tableout.set(string(store_name), to_string(diff));
00121 }
00122 
00123 void maybePrintFinaltimestepStore(const char* time_name, const char* store_name, TableOut & tableout, bool toprint)
00124 {
00125   TIME_STRUCT end_wallclock;
00126   get_current_time(end_wallclock);
00127   
00128   double time_wallclock = diff_time(end_wallclock, start_wallclock);
00129   
00130   CPU_TIME_STRUCT end_time;
00131   get_current_cpu_time(end_time);
00132     
00133   maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_Always, time_name, store_name, tableout, toprint);
00134   if(toprint) 
00135   {
00136     cout << "Total Time: " << diff_cpu_time(end_time, _internal_start_time) << endl;
00137     cout << "Total System Time: " << diff_sys_time(end_time, _internal_start_time) << endl;
00138     cout << "Total Wall Time: " << time_wallclock << endl;
00139   }
00140   tableout.set(string("TotalTime"), diff_cpu_time(end_time, _internal_start_time) );
00141 }
00142 };
